The '''San Diego Comic-Con: International''' is the largest comic convention in the world and always delights [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] fans by having numerous Tolkien-related collectibles and events. This 2001 convention was prior to the release of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]] and showcased a surge of movie-related collectibles.
